text: HRd4 7tq WTTHTf gifeasrut 8M9 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (s* 4ae- a7_{THNf HTTT4) 98 Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 6i-5 & 6, {aer-10, ERoT, 78 ferit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/ HAM Projects /2022 Policy Circular no 8.4.32/2022 dated 8th April, 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No_ NHAI/ GM(F) /HAM/-Interest /2020 (Comp.No. 46658)} Sub.: Interest Rate Applicable for HAM Projects-Interest under clause 23.6.4- reg: This is with regard to the amended Model Concession Agreement for Hybrid Annuity Model Projects. As per the requirement of Article 23.6.4 "Interest shall be due and payable on the reducing balance of Completion Cost at an interest rate equal to the average of one year MCLR of top 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks plus 1.25%" The foot note specifies that "The Authority shall declare the list of 5 Schedule Commercial Bank on Ist September every calendar year based on the balance sheet size as declared in their annual reports,. The year MCLR of the 5 Scheduled commercial banks shall be taken at the start of every quarter". 2_ Accordingly, Authority hereby declare the 5 Schedule Commercial banks along with one year MCLR (Rate of Interest) applicable as on Ist April; 2022. The list of banks shall be next reviewed on Ist September 2022 and the rates shall be published for Ist of every quarter. 3 The rates for the top 5 commercial banks are as below: Sr: No_ Bank's Name One Year MCLR in % Average Rate Applicable (As on 01.04.2022) for the period 01.04.2022 to 30.06.2022 1 State Bank of India 7.00 2 HDFC Bank 7.25 3_ IICICI Bank 7.25 7.21% per annum PLUS 1,.25% 4 Bank of Baroda 7.30 5_ PNB 7.25 4_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. y/w (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices Copy to: 1 _ Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2.
